Mozilla Appmaker Collection

September 6, 2014

Mozilla Appmaker is a very simple tool for those who are not aware of coding but would like to develop HTML5 based mobile applications. It is a free and open source tool which lets you to drag and drop individual components for our application. We can also contribute to their codebase of the Appmaker. Their official repo is at Github. Check it

In simple Appmaker is browser based tool used for creating simple mobile applications for ourselves for free. You easily drag and drop lot of components which you need for developing your personal application, as of now you cannot expect to develop apps like Angry birds.

Know more about Appmaker

To Learn more about bricks (explanation)
  • Basic brick   http://technoruler.blogspot.in/2014/07/basic-bricks-in-mozilla-appmaker-for.html
  • Utility brick  http://technoruler.blogspot.in/2014/07/utility-components-for-appmaker-for.html
  • Connection brick  http://technoruler.blogspot.in/2014/07/connection-bricks-of-appmaker-for.html
  • Audio brick  http://technoruler.blogspot.in/2014/07/audio-bricks-by-app-maker-for-firefox.html
  • Number brick  http://technoruler.blogspot.in/2014/07/number-bricks-by-appmaker-for-firefox-os.html
  • Fun brick  http://technoruler.blogspot.in/2014/07/fun-bricks-are-app-maker-for-firefox-os.html
  • Media brick  http://technoruler.blogspot.in/2014/07/media-bricks-by-appmaker-for-firefox-os.html

You can learn more about Mozilla Appmaker and it components. It is very easy tool to develop simple mobile applications.
